<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Sync Collaborator Permissions For DTable</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { var ownerDescriptorId = '8b0cbfc2c7132010d447c17cf4c26053'; var ownerSynchronizer = new sn_appcollab.CollabPermissionSynchronizer(ownerDescriptorId); ownerSynchronizer.syncCollaboratorPermissions();
var editorDescriptorId = '3bb75c9ec7132010d447c17cf4c2605a'; var editorSynchronizer = new sn_appcollab.CollabPermissionSynchronizer(editorDescriptorId); editorSynchronizer.syncCollaboratorPermissions(); })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-22 07:40:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9194a938c3f23010d4437f9ec840dde4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Sync Collaborator Permissions For DTable</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9194a938c3f23010d4437f9ec840dde4</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-28 03:31:22</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
